ygData.subject: Re: hail and well met
ygData.msgSnippet: ... From: Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)  To:  Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 6:23 AM Subject: RE: [eqbards] hail and well
ygData.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: Blair, Keith (Keith Blair) <kblair@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 6:23 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] hail and well met


> From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
>
> > >What do you folks think of bards in general?
>
> I like my bard mainly for two reasons:
>
> A. Selo's Accelerando.
> B. Ability to use both magic and fighting skills adequately without mana
> concerns.
>
> The only other class I like near as much as a Bard is the Cleric class. I
> thoroughly enjoyed that class as well. Magic & Fighting - but with the
mana
> to worry about.

And not having to worry about standing still to cast.
